frame.name: Active_substance
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Substance</fen> causes an <fen>Effect</fen>. The <fen>Substance</fen> is produced by a process understood as directed towards the <fen>Effect</fen>. The <fen>Name</fen> for the material that makes up the substance may also be given.
<ex>A rationale for using <fex name="sub">denatured gp160</fex> as a <fex name="eff">therapeutic</fex> <t>agent</t> in HIV-infected people is to boost the immune response .</ex>
<ex><fex name="sub">The quinolones</fex> now seem to <m>be</m> the <fex name="eff">antimicrobial</fex> <t>agents</t> of choice for acute bacterial prostatitis.</ex>
<ex><fex name="eff">Hormonally</fex> <t>active</t> <fex name="sub">chemicals</fex> have the potential to cause significant environmental injury.</ex>
<ex>Only after the potion has been drunk does the <t>active</t> <fex name="sub">ingredient</fex> form. <fex name="eff">DNI</fex></ex>
<ex>The <fex name="nam">sarin</fex> <t><fex name="sub">agent</fex></t> might have been a leftover shell from a chemical-arms dump. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Effect
FE.definition:
<def-root>The change brought about by the Substance.
<ex>There is a clear co-variation between allergic symptoms in children and the concentration of <fex name="eff">softening</fex> <t>agents</t> in their homes.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Substance
FE.definition:
<def-root>The internally undifferentiated physical entity that has an <fen>Effect</fen>.
<ex>While marijuana?s advocates say <fex name="sub">the drug</fex> <m>is</m> a mellowing <t>agent</t> that can be used for medicinal purposes, some police will say marijuana is a gateway drug.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Substance</fen>.
<ex>This <fex name="des">transmissible</fex> <t>agent</t> is a virus containing DNA.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE indicates what subtype of the general category the <fen>Substance</fen> belongs to.
<ex><fex name="typ">Pharmacological</fex> <t>agents</t> could then be selected to modify these cascades.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>The name of the material that makes up the active <fen>Substance</fen>.
<ex><fex name="nam"></fex>Anthrax <t>agent</t> in this form is particularly mobile.</ex></def-root>
